product_name: Royal Robbins Ottawa Crew Sweater - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A versatile mid-layer that stands up to daily use on your travel adventures, the wool Ottawa Crew sweater from Royal Robbins delivers breathable warmth while staying light enough to wear year-round. Wool insulates efficiently and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in wide-ranging conditions. Rib-knit shoulder patches; rib-knit elbows to cuffs. Royal Robbins Ottawa Crew sweater features a traditional fit. Closeout.
short_description: A versatile mid-layer that stands up to daily use on your travel adventures, the wool Ottawa Crew sweater from Royal Robbins delivers breathable warmth while staying light enough to wear year-round.
